Cell.Data: Text surounded by {} or [] are special tags for code. These tag will be replaced with other text eg: the name of a player. The tags should NOT be localized. They represent the place in the sentens for their replacing string. Some {} tags start with STR or INT. STR means it will be replaced with text, INT means it will be replaced with a numerical value
Upon landing, we received various signals coming from the planet’s surface. In order to accurately determine the coordinates of one of these broadcasts, we need the data located inside this facility.
我们在着陆时收到了来自行星表面的各种信号。为了精确测定其中一个坐标，我们需要收集这个设施内的数据。

Planetfall successful, Commander. We have been receiving a variety of emergency signals since entering the atmosphere. The source is using an ancient proto-empire protocol that carries the same distress message. Analyzing...
星球着陆成功，指挥官。自从进入大气层以来，我们一直在接收各种紧急信号。消息来源使用的是一种古老的帝国原始协议，向外传递着遇难信息。正在进行分析…
Story message. Speaker: AIVA (female tutorial AI)
The coordinates transmitted by the signals do not match current-day geographical data, Commander. We also cannot accurately locate the origin from the signals alone. Devising alternate method…
指挥官，信号传输的坐标与当前日期的地理数据不匹配。我们也无法仅仅通过信号准确地找到发射来源。正在制定替代方案…
Story message. Speaker: AIVA (female tutorial AI)

Commander, there is an archaic but functional subterranean travel station, repurposed as a bunker, that seems to be picking up these signals. There is a 99% chance this facility has the topological data we need to pinpoint the transmission source. Warning: there are hostile signatures in this makeshift shelter; a prepared military detachment is advised if we choose to investigate the site.
指挥官，我们发现了一个十分古老但功能齐全的地下传输站。这里已经被改造成了一个地堡，并且似乎正在接收这些信号。这个设施有 99% 的可能性拥有我们精确定位传输源所需要的拓扑数据。警告：这个临时避难所存在敌对信号。如果我们要调查这里，最好派遣一支军队前往。
Story message. Speaker: AIVA (female tutorial AI)

Commander, the RPR models we just fought were Union-employed robots used to hunt remnants of the Es’Teq, a faction that once opposed the Empire. My data banks tell me they were supposed to be decommissioned and out of use. Analyzing...
指挥官，刚才与我们战斗的 RPR 模型是由星际联盟雇佣的机器人，用来追捕曾经反对帝国的埃斯特克残余势力。我的数据库告诉我，它们本应早已不再被使用了。正在分析…
Story message. Speaker: AIVA (female tutorial AI)

The facility has traces of recent activity. These RPRs seem to have been waiting for signs of the Es’Teq and were preparing to mount an assault on a location we think matches the origin of one of the signals. Evaluating…
这个设施存在最近活动的痕迹。这些 RPR 似乎一直在等待埃斯特克的信号并准备对一个地点发动攻击。我们发现这个地点与我们其中一个信号来源吻合。正在评估…
Story message. Speaker: AIVA (female tutorial AI)
We received the coordinates of a site we think belongs to whoever is sending one of the emergency signals. We should investigate this location as soon as possible.
我们接收到了一个位置坐标，这里应该是发送紧急信号的地方。我们应该尽快调查这个地点。
Another commander has cleared the anomalous site!
另一名指挥官已经清理了异常地点！
